classification_0.name: classification
classification_0.question: An H&E micrograph of {class}.
options: An H&E micrograph of chronic heart failure.
An H&E micrograph of not chronic heart failure.

classification_1.name: classification
classification_1.question: H&E stained light microscopy image of human cardiac tissue with {class} texture.
options: H&E stained light microscopy image of human cardiac tissue with chronic heart failure texture.
H&E stained light microscopy image of human cardiac tissue with not chronic heart failure texture.

classification.name: classification
classification.question: H&E stained light micrograph of human cardiac tissue. Based on the image, what is the most likely clinical chronic heart diagnosis?
